job.title: Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer, NLP
job.description: strongHealthTech startup based out of Palo Alto CAbrbrstrongThis Jobot Job is hosted by Christina FinsterbrbrAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumebrbrstrongA Bit About UsbrbrstrongOur clients mission is to provide Earths 73 billion citizens with control of their complete health information and give them the choice of sharing it with whomever they wantbrbrstrongbrbrstrongWhy join usbrbrbrstrongstrongPerksbrbrOn a mission to revolutionize healthcarebrbrCulture of doersbrbrVenturebacked Series A equitybrbrGenerous Benefits Discretionary Time OffbrbrstrongJob DetailsbrbrstrongIn this role you will be working with other data scientists and engineers to help build our unstructured data extraction pipeline You will be responsible for leveraging the latest machine learning and natural language processing technology to structure and normalize data from medical records The ideal candidate will have no issue digging into messy data working with clinical subject matter experts to develop annotation guidelines to produce highquality machine learning modelsbrbrstrongRequirementsbrbrstrong2 years experience prototyping and deploying production NLP  Machine Learning modelsbrbr3 years experience with Python and solid software development skillsbrbrFamiliarity with common NLPML frameworks Spacy Pytorch TensorFlow KerasbrbrFluency in stateoftheart machine learning techniques including Transformers CNNs RNNs to solve NLP tasks like Named Entity Recognition Information Extraction Named Entity LinkingbrbrExcellent ability to communicate technical information to nontechnical audiencesbrbrOnly accepting US Based applicants at this timebrbrInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply buttonbrbr
